Package WHOPAYS.Domain

Class xDomainController<T extends DomainObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • WHOPAYS.Domain.xDomainController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A DomainObject subclass, to use in the controller.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    xGroupController, xUserController

extends java.lang.Object
    Domain controller generic class.
